localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Find Food Support connects people to food support resources, including hotlines, SNAP information, and a Google Maps locator tool that points people to their local food banks, food pantries and school meal program pickup locations, among other things.
nodes.title: Find Food Support by Google - Resources for people struggling with food insecurity in USA
nodes.author: Aditya

nodes.excerpt: Dimely is an app that enables you to willingly and transparently monetise your data. With Dimely, you can start earning a small passive income by willingly sharing your data in a way you're absolutely comfortable with. Invite your friends and earn much more.
nodes.title: Dimely - Monetise your data fairly & earn passive income
nodes.author: Georgiana Drumen

nodes.excerpt: Unlimited access to digital content has provided us with an enormous opportunity to discover, learn and grow. Bookshlf focuses on quality and taste, empowering creators (Curators) to monetize their knowledge and expertise by sharing the content they love.
nodes.title: Bookshlf - Earn tips for the content you curate
nodes.author: Nick Abouzeid

nodes.excerpt: Now anyone can easily and securely donate cryptocurrency to support any US charity and get a tax receipt. Every.org is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit that helps people donate. Nonprofits can also get a free "Donate Crypto" button for their website.
nodes.title: Every.org Donate Crypto - Support any charity with crypto - over 1M nonprofits listed!
nodes.author: Tristan Pollock

nodes.excerpt: Every piece of content is handpicked for you by your friends. You only see posts that your friends choose for you to see. With Khuro, you can - Easily choose which friends and friend groups see your posts. - Share photos with your friends. - Post your availability, plans, and thoughts.
nodes.title: Khuro - Made for you. Tailored by your friends.
nodes.author: Will Campbell

nodes.excerpt: The Empathy app empowers families and enables them to navigate the practicalities of loss at their own pace, with all the information and support they need - whether financial, legal, emotional, or logistical.
nodes.title: Empathy - Loss Companion App - Helping people navigate the journey after losing a loved one
nodes.author: Ben Lang

nodes.excerpt: Without Community, There Is No Crypto. LunarCRUSH is a social listening platform for cryptocurrencies and helps investors make better decisions by tracking the community each cryptocurrency is building through beautiful dashboards and real-time data analysis.
nodes.title: LunarCRUSH - Social Listening for Cryptocurrencies
nodes.author: Mahesh Shrestha

nodes.excerpt: Library of Diversity is a space for meaningful conversations that connects people across the globe through video-conference to share stories that promote diversity and inclusion.
nodes.title: Library of Diversity - A place where books are people and reading is a conversation
nodes.author: Pavan BG

nodes.excerpt: Want to expand your social network and meet interesting people online? Join ChitterChat and be matched one time per week with someone to speak to 1 on 1. Having Twitter will speed up the waiting time dramatically as we can verify you're a real person.
nodes.title: ChitterChat - Speak to 1 new person every week
nodes.author: Isaac Joy

nodes.excerpt: Buffelist is a URL listing platform to reach high-quality content on the internet by letting people reach other's content suggestions. You can also share your content suggestions by creating your list. Briefly, Buffelist is a social bookmarking platform.
nodes.title: Buffelist - Content link listing platform to share useful content links
nodes.author: Bekir

nodes.excerpt: Your guide to better sex just got better: create your happiest, healthiest intimate life! Play using guided erotic exercises for more pleasure. Learn with science-based lessons. Connect deeply with your partner via our secure,facilitated chat. You're welcomeğŸ˜‰
nodes.title: Coral 2.0 - Better sex through a mix of science, stories and exercises
nodes.author: Amy Neumann

nodes.excerpt: Gawq unravels echo chambers by serving you algorithm-free news, hyper-focused on transparency, social impact and unbiased reporting. Compare the news, mute the noise, and read between the headlines from over 150+ media sources daily.
nodes.title: Gawq - Unbreaking news. Stay informed, mindfully.
nodes.author: Joshua Dziabiak

nodes.excerpt: Everything a senior needs in a single place. 70% of seniors are now online, but most of them still struggle to use the internet to its full potential. Urizen allows seniors to keep up with the pace and stay on top of their game.
nodes.title: Urizen - A simpler Google for seniors
nodes.author: Nicolas Venard

nodes.excerpt: AirConsole Meet lets you instantly play games with your team in Zoom, Google Meet or any other video conferencing service. The games allow colleagues to bond together while working from home. Perfect for team building during the pandemic.
nodes.title: AirConsole Meet - Play games in video calls with your team
nodes.author: Rafael Morgan

nodes.excerpt: Flinkit! provides remote teams with fun and creative cooperation opportunities to enhance teamwork and trust. Teams can compete at the same time as they follow the carefully designed storyline solving highly visual tasks and riddles.
nodes.title: The Firm by Flinkit! - Web-hosted team building mission for remote teams
nodes.author: Peter Orban

nodes.excerpt: If you love topic-based learning, this is for you! Organize your learning journey with curations and creations. Share knowledge collections to benefit and discuss with peers. Build your personal brand around your learning portfolio.
nodes.title: PalPark - Curate and share your learnings by topics
nodes.author: Yixin Kou

localize.description: å¦‚æœä½ å–œæ¬¢ä¸»é¢˜å¼å­¦ä¹ ï¼Œè¿™å°±æ˜¯ä½ çš„é€‰æ‹©! ç”¨ç­–å±•å’Œåˆ›ä½œæ¥ç»„ç»‡ä½ çš„å­¦ä¹ ä¹‹æ—…ã€‚åˆ†äº«çŸ¥è¯†é›†é”¦ï¼Œä¸åŒè¡Œå…±åŒå—ç›Šå’Œè®¨è®ºã€‚å›´ç»•ä½ çš„å­¦ä¹ ç»„åˆå»ºç«‹ä½ çš„ä¸ªäººå“ç‰Œã€‚

nodes.excerpt: Create your personal page and sell your services for Instagram and TikTok. Easily manage collaborations, receive messages from brands, and get paid directly to your bank account.
nodes.title: Collabstr - A personal page to sell your Instagram & TikTok services
nodes.author: Clayton Rannard

nodes.excerpt: Block Party builds tools against online abuse. Our mission is to create a safer online experience by building solutions for user control, protection and safety. Use Block Party to filter out unwanted @mentions from Twitter and take control of your online experience.
nodes.title: Block Party - Bye-bye, Twitter trolls ğŸ‘‹
nodes.author: Tracy Chou

nodes.excerpt: Memely is the new social network for sharing memes. Here you can share your content via memes, trolls, fun images. Social Network, Tamil Memes, Meme sharing portal, Meme sharing platform
nodes.title: Memely - Meme social network
nodes.author: Memely

nodes.excerpt: Metrics generates infographics about you so you can embed them on your GitHub profile to let other users know more about you. Display your git stats along with an isometric calendar, favorites music, website performances, last tweets, projects, languages,..
nodes.title: GitHub Metrics - Customize your profile with various plugins and metrics
nodes.author: Simon L.

nodes.excerpt: It's easy: go on the map, tap on another user, and send them a request for a photo! Gallery uploads are not allowed, so any photo they send will be taken on the spot, which means extra fresh photos on delivery!
nodes.title: Looxie - Location-based photo requests
nodes.author: Antonis Tsagaris

nodes.excerpt: Ethi helps you find out how Facebook tracks you across the internet, across the world, collects hundreds of interests about you and tracks your social life. Then we help you delete what you no longer want them to keep!
nodes.title: Ethi - Find out what Facebook knows about you, and delete it.
nodes.author: Michael Jelly
